QuestData.Title: Welcome Wagons
QuestData.Description: Did you see the size of those war wagons? They're packing so many explosives, I cannae tell if the Horde is here to take over this continent or just blow it out of the sea!$B$BWe need to neutralize those wagons before they leave Garrosh'ar Point.$B$BHere, take me pocket flares. Fire 'em into a wagon and watch the fireworks!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Sully's Flaregun to destroy 5 Horde War Wagons.
QuestData.RewardText: With those wagons out of commission, we can turn our attention to the commander.
